content: Rapid multidimensional assessment maps strengths (4.3 GPA, early coding start, film+CS duality) against gaps (community service, awards, leadership visibility). Time audit exposes only ~2 hours/day for high-impact work—becomes the constraint to solve.
insight_vector: High-achiever with time scarcity; missing service/awards; film+CS duality

content: Trust formation via credibility (Stanford), vulnerability (own Chinatown project), and parent navigation. Ends with strong affirmation and agency transfer (‘believe it for yourself’).
insight_vector: Credibility + vulnerability + parent navigation → agency transfer

content: Identity synthesis: Film + CS → ‘Digital Storyteller’. Align capstone with AI ethics for young women; leverage Stanford program signals to anchor long-term narrative.
insight_vector: Film+CS synthesis; AI ethics alignment; long-term narrative

content: The ‘Challenge Question’ pattern triggers self-discovery and saves weeks: ‘Do you need a program to be a leader—or just lead?’ Eliminates LaunchX detour, reclaims 4 weeks for building.
insight_vector: Challenge Question saves 4 weeks; self-discovery trigger
